animeDescription: Episode list: 1: Episode 00 - Pilot Movie 2: TYPE BLUE -the ORIGIN- 3: Epilogue  Music video Coming Home to Terra isn't included in the entry as it doesn't contain any new scenes. Recap episode, also known as episode 6.5, is actually a fan-made picture drama; thus, it's also not included.
